1.title: The Poly Tradition
1.plot: Long Beach Poly has produced more NFL athletes than any other school in the world, but will 2017 be the year of the Jackrabbit?

2.title: Matt Corral: #2
2.plot: Ranked No. 2 in the nation, recent transfer Matt Corral takes the helm as Poly's new quarterback with a lot to prove.

3.title: To Give and to Receive
3.plot: After a life on the run, from a tough upbringing, to a new family, Jalen Hall, the most recruited receiver in America, will stand tall and shake things up in Long Beach.

4.title: Dream Intercepted?
4.plot: Cornerback Desmond Talley is a Long Beach guy through and through. A talented athlete with swagger to spare. But despite all his skills, Desmond is an eternal underdog.

5.title: Big Cam on Campus
5.plot: 4 year varsity star Camren McDonald is one of the top tight-ends in the nation and the Jackrabbit's leader. Heading into week 4, the captain looks to right his ship.

6.title: Eyes On The Prize
6.plot: The Jackrabbit's continue to roll through their competition in the Moore league. But with playoffs on the horizon, a string of easy wins might not be what the team needs.

7.title: So Long, Long Beach
7.plot: The Jackrabbits' 8-2 record has earned them a spot in the California state playoffs. They'll have to rally together to avoid a repeat of last season's first round loss.

imdb.plot outline: The Machine" tells the story of the 2017 Long Beach Poly Jackrabbits, and their journey to carry on the tradition of the Poly football legends who've come before them. Coached by Superbowl champion Antonio Pierce, the one-time powerhouse program is still one of the top producers of NFL talent but has become a perennial underdog. In a field dominated by million dollar private schools and sports academies, Poly must fight to stay relevant as an underfunded public school. "The Machine" emerged from 5 months of unprecedented intimate access to the players, coaches, and community surrounding the most storied high school football program in American History. Coach Pierce is joined by NFL legends Lavar Arrington, and TJ Houshmandzadeh, to lead roster of players which includes the most highly recruited quarterback/wide-receiver duo in the nation, alongside kids struggling to use the game as a way to escape legacies of crime and violence.
imdb.title: The Machine
